argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nfifd.2 | |- ( ph -> F/ x ps ) |
| 2 |  | nfifd.3 | |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) |
| 3 |  | nfifd.4 | |- ( ph -> F/_ x B ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dfif2 | |- if ( ps , A , B ) = { y | ( ( y e. B -> ps ) -> ( y e. A /\ ps ) ) } |
| 5 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ y ph |
| 6 | 3 | #P_nfcrd | |- ( ph -> F/ x y e. B ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_nfimd | |- ( ph -> F/ x ( y e. B -> ps ) ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_nfcrd | |- ( ph -> F/ x y e. A ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_nfand | |- ( ph -> F/ x ( y e. A /\ ps ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_nfimd | |- ( ph -> F/ x ( ( y e. B -> ps ) -> ( y e. A /\ ps ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_nfabd | |- ( ph -> F/_ x { y | ( ( y e. B -> ps ) -> ( y e. A /\ ps ) ) } ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_nfcxfrd | |- ( ph -> F/_ x if ( ps , A , B ) ) |
